employee.title: Marketing Manager
employee.description: I'm a graphic designer with over 25 years of experience in the design world, helping businesses and indivuals promote themselves effectively. I have done freelance work for for-profit and non-profit companies, including Girl Scouts of Greater Atlanta, Ochsner Clinic Foundation, Ronald McDonald House Charities-South Louisiana, and Volunteers of America (Baton Rouge chapter), and working at Girl Scouts Louisiana East for the last 13 years.
